2016 Best Short Film, Animated OSCAR WINNING MOVIE FROM CHILE!



Inspired by the exile of Osorioâ€™s grandfather during the military government in Chile, Bear Story is the academy awardÂ® winning shortfilm about a bear who longs to return to his family, where he belongs.

     Bear Story is a moving shortfilm with a powerful message, directed by Gabriel Osorio and produced by Pato Escala. It premiered in Annecy Animation festival in 2014, and since then it has received over 50 international awards in the festival circuit, including Palm Springs Shortfest, Nashville, Cleveland Film Festival, Animamundi, and audience awards at Zagreb, Florida Film Festival, and Klik! Holland Animation Festival.

Bear Story won and Academy AwardÂ® for best animated short at the 88th Academy Awards, 2016.
